outputs.output_descr: . It aims at supporting the Government National Youth Employment Programme (YEP) and similar UN initiatives. Its specific objectives are: to provide rapid employment opportunities and income generating activities for young people, to strengthen the capacity of Ministry of Youth and Sports at the national and local levels that will facilitate the participation of young people in decision making process, to mainstream youth employment into all national policies and development initiatives.

The programme will revolve around mainstreaming youth employment issues in national development policies and implementation processes, improving employment and youth employment, support for education and training, development of a strategy for the promotion of social cohesion and protectionfor decent employment opportunities, development of a strategy for the promotion of social cohesion and protection for decent employment with the participation of all stakeholders. It will build on successful ongoing youth projects as well as implement pilot initiatives for the purpose of providing immediate emplyment simultaneously as developing a medium and longterm strategy for tackling youth employment and social cohesion challenges. It will support agreement between political parties to create alternatives to ciolence in the political competition between political parties. Youth employment and political dialogue are  important programmes of the new joint UN vision for Sierra Leone for national peace building.

project_descr: This Programme  aims to enhance Government and UN interventions to prevent further marginalization of Youth in Sierra Leone.    The specific objectives of  this  Programme are:  to provide rapid Employment opportunities and income generating activities.
project_title: UN support to the National Youth Employment Scheme
